players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked by Charlie's sudden demise. We should all be vigilant and work together to find out who did this."
You: "Charlie's death is a stark reminder of the danger we're in. We need to work together and share any information we have to uncover the truth."
Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share any suspicious activities or observations we may have had during the night. Let's work together to uncover the truth behind Charlie's death."
